Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Otu nwokorobịa nọ ọzụzụ ụkọchukwu adaala ma nwụọ na mahadum Claratian University of Nigeria, dị na Nekede, Owere n'ụbọchị Fraide.
Suel Ambrose gbara afọ iri abụọ na ise na-eme agwa Peter (otu n'ime ụmụ azụ Karisti) n'ejije ahụhụ Kraisti tara, dara ada n'ogige mahadum ahụ, nwụọ.
Good Friday: Ihe Easter ji apụrụ m iche karịa emume ụka ndị ọzọ'
Etu ihe mberede si gbuo ndị ‘sister' Katọlik abụọ na ndị ọzọ n’Anambra
Etu esi mee ụka ọmụ taa
Mmọnwụ Coal Camp pụtara ịgba 'Easter'
E bugara ya n'ụlọọgwụ mahadum ebe ha galiri ike ha tupu e buga ya ụlọọgwụ 'Federal Medical Centre' dị n'Owere, ebe e kwuru na ọ nwụọla.
Peter(Ambrose) dịka ọ n'akụkụ 'Kraistí' n'Ọrịrị Ikpeazụ
Oge onyentaakụkọ anyị gara ebe ahụ n'ụtụtụ Satọde, ebe niile dara jụụ dịka o nweghị emume Easter a na-eme n'ogige ahụ.
Ụkọchukwu na-achịkọta ụlọakwụkwọ ahụ bụ Fada Chukwuemeka Iheme gwara onye ntaakụkọ anyị na ụlọakwụkwọ ahụ ga-akọwapụtara ọha ihe mere "ma ndị ọdị n'aka nye anyị ikike."
Mana ụmụakwụkwọ kwuru na Ambrose , onye nọ afọ mbụ ya na ngalaba 'Philosophy' dara  oge ha na-eme ejije maka Ọnwụ Kraisti, nwụọ ozigbo.
Kraistị gwara Peter sị, "Tinye mma gị n'ọbọ n'ihi na..."
Otu n'ime ha anyị achọghị ịkpọ aha ya sịrị, "Ọ na-eme agwa Peter ebe Peter bechapụrụ otu n'ime ndịagha ntị, Jesọs were tighachikwa ya ma gwa Peter ka o tinye mma ya n'ọbọ."
"Oge ndịagha malitere chụwa ndị ụmụazụ ọzọ ịchufu ha, o dara n'ala malite gbawa ọbara."
Anyị bugara ya n'ụlọọgwụ nke ụlọakwụkwọ anyị, ndị dọkịta nwara ike ha, mana ọ zaghị ha."
"Anyị burukwa ya gawa ụlọọgwụ 'Federal Medical Centre' dị Owere, ebe ahụ ka ekwuru na ọ laala mmụọ."
